column2: My liege, there are rumours that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered together a massive army of soldiers, mercenaries and loyalists. It is unknown for what purpose this army is for but it cannot be for peaceful purposes.

This CB allows you to wage a great expansionist war to subjugate a kingdom and his ruler to your growing empire. All titles of the target kingdom will be subjugated. An entire empire cannot be subjugated.
